name: Cheesy Fries
description: Upgrade your burger combo with a side of Cheesy Fries! This seasoning is your answer to easy, lower-sodium fancy frites at home. Try veggie fries, too—slice sweet potatoes or yams, carrots, parsnips, zucchini, or even beets into fries and roast with seasoning for a low-carb side dish.
preparation: Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Arrange fries on pan and sprinkle with 1 tbsp seasoning; toss to coat.
Cook fries according to package directions. Sprinkle cooked fries with remaining seasoning before serving.
tips: Got extra time? Make your own fries—try Rosemary Garlic Oven Fries but swap in Cheesy Fries Seasoning or Kickin’ Jalapeño Burger Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp prepared Epicure Dressing.
